title: odunybiz
author: odunybiz
created_time: August 27, 2023, 11:05:36 PMLast edit: August 28, 2023, 06:54:08 AM by odunybiz
content: In recent time, inflation in Nigeria is on a high rate as the nationâ€™s economy is biting harder. It isn't seen that things will change as soon as possible. Therefore, it better for one to plan on how to live his/her life with the recent economy. The following tips could be helpful:ðŸ‘‰ðŸ‘‰Create a realistic monthly budget.Using your monthly take-home pay, set a budget that works with your lifestyle and spending habits. Ensure it's a budget you can keep. Work with this budget every month.ðŸ‘‰ðŸ‘‰Avoid unnecessary visit.After the removal of fuel subsidy, transportation is very costly. If care isn't taken, one can spend more than one-third of his/her salary on transport. Moving up and down unnecessary can cost you more. Making one to spend more on transport and this may affect ones monthly budget.ðŸ‘‰ðŸ‘‰Get a side hustle job.Depending on monthly salary alone may not solve any problem. An average Nigeria man will spend above #2000 a day, this is #60000 monthly which is far higher than the minimum wage. Doing something that can earn you extra money can help you out during this economic downfall.ðŸ‘‰ðŸ‘‰Avoid borrowing or unnecessary loan.Some people are found of borrowing money on monthly basis to cope with this economic downfall. This isn't a good solution at the moment because you keep incurring debt on yourself every month. Loan is the worst as this come with high interest at the moment. Getting unnecessary loan for feeding, fashion and expensive shelter put you in more debt as you keep struggling to pay back.ðŸ‘‰ðŸ‘‰ Avoid spending money on unnecessary items.For the time being, you should learn how to minimize your spending. Avoid spending money on an item you can do without. Not all item is necessary to purchase at this moment. This money can be save to purchase more valuable items or use for more important thing.ðŸ‘‰ðŸ‘‰Try buying your goods at a cheaper place.Avoid getting item at an expensive place when you can get the same item else where at a cheaper price. For example, buying a cloth you can get for #5K at Mokola for #9K at a boutique may not help the present situation. This is a money mistake that shouldn't be made at this moment.ðŸ‘‰ðŸ‘‰Invest in yourself.The best investment in life is for one to invest in himself. Learn basic skills like Blockchain, programming and coding with your spare time. This may help you secure a better job with high pay in the future.ðŸ‘‰ðŸ‘‰ Maintain your health.Health is wealth. Having a good health status will enable you work well and improve your mental state.CONCLUSIONAt this moment in Nigeria, one has to learn on how to cope with the country's present situation. I believe if the above points are put into consideration, one can easily live to the average with the inflation rate.

comments.author: Joyce ukata
comments.body: Given the current economic situation in Nigeria, it's important for everyone to be mindful of their spending and create a budget to adhere to. Due to the expensive transportation costs, I decided to buy a bicycle for commuting to work. This way, I can avoid excessive daily transportation expenses.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP all you have said is not far from the truth. The current situation of the country and economy requires one to be more economical with their expenses. It is not funny anymore that the inflation rate is getting high every day with no policies at hand to cushion the effects. The listed points which you have mentioned all must be taken into Cognisance. One must have financial intelligence and likewise financial security at the moment to avoid careless expenses and money loss or theft. The street is very rough though and cold these days. Everybody wants to take advantage of every little opportunity encountered to milk dry anybody wey falls mugu.
